verses.verse: In the first <S%H2298><s%> year <S%H8140><s%> of Belshazzar <S%H1113><s%> king <S%H4430><s%> of Babylon <S%H895><s%> Daniel <S%H1841><s%> had <S%H2370><s%> a dream <S%H2493><s%> and visions <S%H2376><s%> of his head <S%H7217><s%> upon <S%H5922><s%> his bed: <S%H4903><s%> then <S%H116><s%> he wrote <S%H3790><s%> the dream, <S%H2493><s%> and told <S%H560><s%> the sum <S%H7217><s%> of the matters. <S%H4406><s%>

Daniel <S%H1841><s%> spoke <S%H6032><s%> and said, <S%H560><s%> I saw <S%H1934><s%> <S%H2370><s%> in my vision <S%H2376><s%> by <S%H5974><s%> night, <S%H3916><s%> and, behold, <S%H718><s%> the four <S%H703><s%> winds <S%H7308><s%> of the heaven <S%H8065><s%> strove <S%H1519><s%> upon the great <S%H7229><s%> sea. <S%H3221><s%>

And four <S%H703><s%> great <S%H7260><s%> beasts <S%H2423><s%> came up <S%H5559><s%> from <S%H4481><s%> the sea, <S%H3221><s%> diverse <S%H8133><s%> one <S%H1668><s%> from another. <S%H4481><s%> <S%H1668><s%>

The first <S%H6933><s%> was like a lion, <S%H744><s%> and had eagle's <S%H1768><s%> <S%H5403><s%> wings: <S%H1611><s%> I beheld <S%H1934><s%> <S%H2370><s%> till <S%H5705><s%> <S%H1768><s%> the wings <S%H1611><s%> thereof were plucked, <S%H4804><s%> and it was lifted up <S%H5191><s%> from <S%H4481><s%> the earth, <S%H772><s%> and made stand <S%H6966><s%> upon <S%H5922><s%> the feet <S%H7271><s%> as a man, <S%H606><s%> and a man's <S%H606><s%> heart <S%H3825><s%> was given <S%H3052><s%> to it.

And behold <S%H718><s%> another <S%H317><s%> beast, <S%H2423><s%> a second, <S%H8578><s%> like <S%H1821><s%> to a bear, <S%H1678><s%> and it raised up <S%H6966><s%> itself on one <S%H2298><s%> side, <S%H7859><s%> and it had three <S%H8532><s%> ribs <S%H5967><s%> in the mouth <S%H6433><s%> of it between <S%H997><s%> the teeth <S%H8128><s%> of it: and they said <S%H560><s%> thus <S%H3652><s%> unto it, Arise, <S%H6966><s%> devour <S%H399><s%> much <S%H7690><s%> flesh. <S%H1321><s%>

After <S%H870><s%> this <S%H1836><s%> I beheld, <S%H1934><s%> <S%H2370><s%> and lo <S%H718><s%> another, <S%H317><s%> like a leopard, <S%H5245><s%> which had upon <S%H5922><s%> the back <S%H1355><s%> of it four <S%H703><s%> wings <S%H1611><s%> of <S%H1768><s%> a fowl; <S%H5776><s%> the beast <S%H2423><s%> had also four <S%H703><s%> heads; <S%H7217><s%> and dominion <S%H7985><s%> was given <S%H3052><s%> to it.

After <S%H870><s%> this <S%H1836><s%> I saw <S%H1934><s%> <S%H2370><s%> in the night <S%H3916><s%> visions, <S%H2376><s%> and behold <S%H718><s%> a fourth <S%H7244><s%> beast, <S%H2423><s%> dreadful <S%H1763><s%> and terrible, <S%H574><s%> and strong <S%H8624><s%> exceedingly; <S%H3493><s%> and it had great <S%H7260><s%> iron <S%H1768><s%> <S%H6523><s%> teeth: <S%H8128><s%> it devoured <S%H399><s%> and broke in pieces, <S%H1855><s%> and stamped <S%H7512><s%> the residue <S%H7606><s%> with the feet <S%H7271><s%> of it: and it <S%H1932><s%> was diverse <S%H8133><s%> from <S%H4481><s%> all <S%H3606><s%> the beasts <S%H2423><s%> that <S%H1768><s%> were before <S%H6925><s%> it; and it had ten <S%H6236><s%> horns. <S%H7162><s%>

I considered <S%H1934><s%> <S%H7920><s%> the horns, <S%H7162><s%> and, behold, <S%H431><s%> there came up <S%H5559><s%> among <S%H997><s%> them another <S%H317><s%> little <S%H2192><s%> horn, <S%H7162><s%> before <S%H4481><s%> <S%H6925><s%> whom there were three <S%H8532><s%> of <S%H4481><s%> the first <S%H6933><s%> horns <S%H7162><s%> plucked up by the roots: <S%H6132><s%> and, behold, <S%H431><s%> in this <S%H1668><s%> horn <S%H7162><s%> were eyes <S%H5870><s%> like the eyes <S%H5870><s%> of man, <S%H606><s%> and a mouth <S%H6433><s%> speaking <S%H4449><s%> great things. <S%H7260><s%>

I beheld <S%H1934><s%> <S%H2370><s%> till <S%H5705><s%> <S%H1768><s%> the thrones <S%H3764><s%> were cast down, <S%H7412><s%> and the Ancient <S%H6268><s%> of days <S%H3118><s%> did sit, <S%H3488><s%> whose garment <S%H3831><s%> was white <S%H2358><s%> as snow, <S%H8517><s%> and the hair <S%H8177><s%> of his head <S%H7217><s%> like the pure <S%H5343><s%> wool: <S%H6015><s%> his throne <S%H3764><s%> was like the fiery <S%H1768><s%> <S%H5135><s%> flame, <S%H7631><s%> and his wheels <S%H1535><s%> as burning <S%H1815><s%> fire. <S%H5135><s%>

A fiery <S%H1768><s%> <S%H5135><s%> stream <S%H5103><s%> issued <S%H5047><s%> and came forth <S%H5312><s%> from <S%H4481><s%> before <S%H6925><s%> him: thousand <S%H506><s%> thousands <S%H506><s%> ministered <S%H8120><s%> unto him, and ten thousand times ten thousand <S%H7240><s%> <S%H7240><s%> stood <S%H6966><s%> before <S%H6925><s%> him: the judgment <S%H1780><s%> was set, <S%H3488><s%> and the books <S%H5609><s%> were opened. <S%H6606><s%>

I beheld <S%H1934><s%> <S%H2370><s%> then <S%H116><s%> because of <S%H4481><s%> the voice <S%H7032><s%> of the great <S%H7260><s%> words <S%H4406><s%> which <S%H1768><s%> the horn <S%H7162><s%> spoke: <S%H4449><s%> I beheld <S%H1934><s%> <S%H2370><s%> even till <S%H5705><s%> <S%H1768><s%> the beast <S%H2423><s%> was slain, <S%H6992><s%> and his body <S%H1655><s%> destroyed, <S%H7><s%> and given <S%H3052><s%> to the burning <S%H3346><s%> flame. <S%H785><s%>

As concerning the rest <S%H7606><s%> of the beasts, <S%H2423><s%> they had their dominion <S%H7985><s%> taken away: <S%H5709><s%> yet their lives <S%H2417><s%> were prolonged <S%H754><s%> <S%H3052><s%> for <S%H5705><s%> a season <S%H2166><s%> and time. <S%H5732><s%>

I saw <S%H1934><s%> <S%H2370><s%> in the night <S%H3916><s%> visions, <S%H2376><s%> and, behold, <S%H718><s%> one like the Son <S%H1247><s%> of man <S%H606><s%> came <S%H1934><s%> <S%H858><s%> with <S%H5974><s%> the clouds <S%H6050><s%> of heaven, <S%H8065><s%> and came <S%H4291><s%> to <S%H5705><s%> the Ancient <S%H6268><s%> of days, <S%H3118><s%> and they brought him near <S%H7127><s%> before <S%H6925><s%> him.

And there was given <S%H3052><s%> him dominion, <S%H7985><s%> and glory, <S%H3367><s%> and a kingdom, <S%H4437><s%> that all <S%H3606><s%> people, <S%H5972><s%> nations, <S%H524><s%> and languages, <S%H3961><s%> should serve <S%H6399><s%> him: his dominion <S%H7985><s%> is an everlasting <S%H5957><s%> dominion, <S%H7985><s%> which <S%H1768><s%> shall not <S%H3809><s%> pass away, <S%H5709><s%> and his kingdom <S%H4437><s%> that which <S%H1768><s%> shall not <S%H3809><s%> be destroyed. <S%H2255><s%>

I <S%H576><s%> Daniel <S%H1841><s%> was grieved <S%H3735><s%> in my spirit <S%H7308><s%> in the midst <S%H1459><s%> of my body, <S%H5085><s%> and the visions <S%H2376><s%> of my head <S%H7217><s%> troubled <S%H927><s%> me.

I came near <S%H7127><s%> unto <S%H5922><s%> one <S%H2298><s%> of <S%H4481><s%> them that stood by, <S%H6966><s%> and asked <S%H1156><s%> <S%H4481><s%> him the truth <S%H3330><s%> of <S%H5922><s%> all <S%H3606><s%> this. <S%H1836><s%> So he told <S%H560><s%> me, and made me know <S%H3046><s%> the interpretation <S%H6591><s%> of the things. <S%H4406><s%>

These <S%H459><s%> great <S%H7260><s%> beasts, <S%H2423><s%> which <S%H1768><s%> are four, <S%H703><s%> are four <S%H703><s%> kings, <S%H4430><s%> which shall arise <S%H6966><s%> out of <S%H4481><s%> the earth. <S%H772><s%>

But the saints <S%H6922><s%> of the most High <S%H5946><s%> shall take <S%H6902><s%> the kingdom, <S%H4437><s%> and possess <S%H2631><s%> the kingdom <S%H4437><s%> forever, <S%H5705><s%> <S%H5957><s%> even forever <S%H5705><s%> <S%H5957><s%> and ever. <S%H5957><s%>

Then <S%H116><s%> I would <S%H6634><s%> know <S%H3046><s%> the truth <S%H3321><s%> of <S%H5922><s%> the fourth <S%H7244><s%> beast, <S%H2423><s%> which <S%H1768><s%> was <S%H1934><s%> diverse <S%H8133><s%> from <S%H4481><s%> all <S%H3606><s%> the others, exceeding <S%H3493><s%> dreadful, <S%H1763><s%> whose teeth <S%H8128><s%> were of <S%H1768><s%> iron, <S%H6523><s%> and his nails <S%H2953><s%> of <S%H1768><s%> brass; <S%H5174><s%> which devoured, <S%H399><s%> broke in pieces, <S%H1855><s%> and stamped <S%H7512><s%> the residue <S%H7606><s%> with his feet; <S%H7271><s%>

And of <S%H5922><s%> the ten <S%H6236><s%> horns <S%H7162><s%> that <S%H1768><s%> were in his head, <S%H7217><s%> and of the other <S%H317><s%> which <S%H1768><s%> came up, <S%H5559><s%> and before <S%H4481><s%> <S%H6925><s%> whom three <S%H8532><s%> fell; <S%H5308><s%> even of that <S%H1797><s%> horn <S%H7162><s%> that had eyes, <S%H5870><s%> and a mouth <S%H6433><s%> that spoke <S%H4449><s%> very great things, <S%H7260><s%> whose look <S%H2376><s%> was more stout <S%H7229><s%> than <S%H4481><s%> his fellows. <S%H2273><s%>

I beheld, <S%H1934><s%> <S%H2370><s%> and the same <S%H1797><s%> horn <S%H7162><s%> made <S%H5648><s%> war <S%H7129><s%> with <S%H5974><s%> the saints, <S%H6922><s%> and prevailed <S%H3202><s%> against them;

Until <S%H5705><s%> <S%H1768><s%> the Ancient <S%H6268><s%> of days <S%H3118><s%> came, <S%H858><s%> and judgment <S%H1780><s%> was given <S%H3052><s%> to the saints <S%H6922><s%> of the most High; <S%H5946><s%> and the time <S%H2166><s%> came <S%H4291><s%> that the saints <S%H6922><s%> possessed <S%H2631><s%> the kingdom. <S%H4437><s%>

Thus <S%H3652><s%> he said, <S%H560><s%> The fourth <S%H7244><s%> beast <S%H2423><s%> shall be <S%H1934><s%> the fourth <S%H7244><s%> kingdom <S%H4437><s%> upon earth, <S%H772><s%> which <S%H1768><s%> shall be diverse <S%H8133><s%> from <S%H4481><s%> all <S%H3606><s%> kingdoms, <S%H4437><s%> and shall devour <S%H399><s%> the whole <S%H3606><s%> earth, <S%H772><s%> and shall tread it down, <S%H1759><s%> and break it in pieces. <S%H1855><s%>

And the ten <S%H6236><s%> horns <S%H7162><s%> out of <S%H4481><s%> this kingdom <S%H4437><s%> are ten <S%H6236><s%> kings <S%H4430><s%> that shall arise: <S%H6966><s%> and another <S%H321><s%> shall rise <S%H6966><s%> after <S%H311><s%> them; and he <S%H1932><s%> shall be diverse <S%H8133><s%> from <S%H4481><s%> the first, <S%H6933><s%> and he shall subdue <S%H8214><s%> three <S%H8532><s%> kings. <S%H4430><s%>

And he shall speak <S%H4449><s%> great words <S%H4406><s%> against <S%H6655><s%> the most High, <S%H5943><s%> and shall wear out <S%H1080><s%> the saints <S%H6922><s%> of the most High, <S%H5946><s%> and think <S%H5452><s%> to change <S%H8133><s%> times <S%H2166><s%> and laws: <S%H1882><s%> and they shall be given <S%H3052><s%> into his hand <S%H3028><s%> until <S%H5705><s%> a time <S%H5732><s%> and times <S%H5732><s%> and the dividing <S%H6387><s%> of time. <S%H5732><s%>

But the judgment <S%H1780><s%> shall sit, <S%H3488><s%> and they shall take away <S%H5709><s%> his dominion, <S%H7985><s%> to consume <S%H8046><s%> and to destroy <S%H7><s%> it unto <S%H5705><s%> the end. <S%H5491><s%>

And the kingdom <S%H4437><s%> and dominion, <S%H7985><s%> and the greatness <S%H7238><s%> of <S%H1768><s%> the kingdom <S%H4437><s%> under <S%H8460><s%> the whole <S%H3606><s%> heaven, <S%H8065><s%> shall be given <S%H3052><s%> to the people <S%H5972><s%> of the saints <S%H6922><s%> of the most High, <S%H5946><s%> whose kingdom <S%H4437><s%> is an everlasting <S%H5957><s%> kingdom, <S%H4437><s%> and all <S%H3606><s%> dominions <S%H7985><s%> shall serve <S%H6399><s%> and obey <S%H8086><s%> him.

Hitherto <S%H5705><s%> <S%H3542><s%> is the end <S%H5491><s%> of <S%H1768><s%> the matter. <S%H4406><s%> As for me <S%H576><s%> Daniel, <S%H1841><s%> my cogitations <S%H7476><s%> much <S%H7690><s%> troubled <S%H927><s%> me, and my countenance <S%H2122><s%> changed <S%H8133><s%> in <S%H5922><s%> me: but I kept <S%H5202><s%> the matter <S%H4406><s%> in my heart. <S%H3821><s%>
